Package org.openlca.core.results

Class Sankey<T>

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.core.results.Sankey<T>
public class Sankey<T> extends Object
An instance of this class contains the underlying graph data structure of a Sankey diagram. It does not contain methods for rendering the diagram on some output but just the data structures and functions for building the graph.

      Traverses the graph in breadth-first order starting from the root.

    • getLinkShare

      public double getLinkShare​(Sankey.Node provider, Sankey.Node node)
      Get the share of the upstream total of the given provider that goes into the given node. If the provider is only a provider of the given node, the share is 1. If it is a provider of several nodes (e.g. an electricity process that provides electricity to several other processes) the link share is a value between 0 and 1. The link share can also be a negative value (-1..0) in case of negative upstream contributions.

    • toDot

      public String toDot()
      Returns a string with the graph in DOT format ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DOT_(graph_description_language)).
